term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - electron probe X-ray microanalysis (EPXMA)
term.title: electron probe X-ray microanalysis

item.text: Any analytical technique which uses the excitation and evaluation of the characteristic X-ray spectrum of a solid specimen by a focused electron beam (typically of a diameter of less than 1 µm). Qualitative and quantitative X-ray analysis is the main feature of EPXMA. For obtaining supplementary information the secondary, back scattered and absorbed electrons are also frequently observed. Qualitative and quantitative X-ray analysis is, however, the main feature of EPXMA.
